Sky–500.description:
Accessibility: n/a

For use with non-interactive elements (illustrations or backgrounds)

Sky–600.description:
Accessibility: AA (used w/ white)

Default state of CTA elements (primary/secondary/tertiary and text links)

Sky–700.description:
Accessibility: AA (used w/ white)

Hover state of CTA elements (primary/secondary/tertiary and text links)

Sky–800.description:
Accessibility: AAA (used w/ white)

Used for pressed state of CTA elements (primary/secondary/tertiary and text links)
